name: Leoric's Crown
flavorText: The crown of the Black King. The taint of his madness wafts from the metal, clinging to any jewel that comes near it.
flavorTextHtml: The crown of the Black King. The taint of his madness wafts from the metal, clinging to any jewel that comes near it.

secondary.textHtml: Increase the effect of any gem socketed into this item by [75 - 100]%. This effect does not apply to Legendary Gems.
